channel.title: Cisco Bluesfest
channel.description:
I'm seeing Bedouin Soundclash and Skrillex tonight. Mac Miller and Joe Satriani next weekend.
Anyone else ever been?

item.title: Cisco Bluesfest
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

What the fuck is Skrillex doing on a “bluesfest”?

Read full topic

item.title: Cisco Bluesfest
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:7, topic:402754”]Like 2 bands worthwhile in that massive list, what a disappointing festival.[/quote]Man, I’m in Canada and its a bluesfest haha, I’m happy there are as many decent bands as there is.

Read full topic

item.title: Cisco Bluesfest
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

You can add Dropkick Murphies, Infected Mushroom, Protest the Hero and Three Days Grace to the list of bands I’m seeing. I got a passport to the whole festival so mehh.

Here’s the lineup:
